abstract: Traders, bankers and brokers face a bonus of nothing, and if their salaries have doubled, that is little consolation.
snippet: Traders, bankers and brokers face a bonus of nothing, and if their salaries have doubled, that is little consolation.
lead_paragraph: Bonus season is fast approaching on Wall Street, but this year the talk does not center just on multimillion-dollar paydays. It’s about a new club that no one wants to join: the Zeros.

headline.main: This Bonus Season on Wall Street, Many See Zeros
headline.print_headline: This Bonus Season on Wall St., Many Face Nothing but Zeros

byline.original: By Nelson D. Schwartz and Susanne Craig

abstract: J.P. Morgan said Monday that it had acquired a new European headquarters at 25 Bank Street, London, a Canary Wharf skyscraper occupied by Lehman Brothers until its  collapse in 2008.
snippet: J.P. Morgan said Monday that it had acquired a new European headquarters at 25 Bank Street, London, a Canary Wharf skyscraper occupied by Lehman Brothers until its  collapse in 2008.
lead_paragraph: J.P. Morgan, the investment banking division of JPMorgan Chase, said Monday that it had acquired a new European headquarters at 25 Bank Street, London, a Canary Wharf skyscraper occupied by Lehman Brothers until its collapse in 2008.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan Buys Lehman’s Old Site in Canary Wharf
